archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.7: Security should be designed into all architectural layers (e.g. business, data, applications and technology) with any superfluous layers decommissioned following regular reviews.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
